original_text: Your servants should bring some royal clothes that you yourself have worn. They should bring a horse that you yourself have ridden on as king. They should put a special crown on the horse's head to show that it belongs to you.
korean_text: 왕께서 입으시는 왕복과 왕께서 타시는 말과 머리에 쓰시는 왕관을 가져다가

sentences.original_text: Your servants should bring some royal clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 신하들이 왕의 옷을 가져와야 합니다
그들은 말 한 마리를 가져와야 합니다

sentences.original_text: that you yourself have ridden on as king
They should put a special crown
to show that it belongs to you
